fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Banking and financial services

Capital Markets Union 
Digital Single Market

organisation_name: EBAN ASBL - The European Trade Association for Business Angels, Seed Funds and Early Stage Market Players (EBAN)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: EBAN is the pan-European representative for the early stage investor community, gathering 197 member organisations in 59 countries around the world. Established in 1999 by a group of pioneer angel networks in Europe with the collaboration of the European Commission and EURADA, EBAN represents a sector estimated to invest 9,9 billion Euros a year and playing a vital role in Europe’s future, notably in the funding of SMEs.
relevant_communication:

Future Internet Business - SME investment readiness, investor sensitization, connect to finance 
 
ePlus Ecosystem - SME investment readiness, investor sensitization, connect to finance
